abstract: <jats:p>We describe a new species of <jats:italic>Cordyligaster</jats:italic> Macquart (Diptera: Tachinidae) from Area de Conservacion Guanacaste (ACG) in northwestern Costa Rica. <jats:italic>Cordyligaster capellii</jats:italic> <jats:bold>sp. n.</jats:bold>, is described and photographed. All specimens of <jats:italic>C. capellii</jats:italic> were reared from <jats:italic>Syngamia florella</jats:italic> (Stoll, 1781) (Lepidoptera, Crambidae, Spilomelinae), a leaf-rolling caterpillar collected in ACG rain forest. By coupling morphology, photographic documentation, life history and molecular data, we provide a clear and concise description of this new species. In addition the authors provide new distribution and host records for <jats:italic>C. fuscipennis</jats:italic> (Macquart) reared in ACG.</jats:p>
title: A new species of Cordyligaster Macquart, reared from caterpillars in Area de Conservacion Guanacaste, northwestern Costa Rica
